attributes.action: Locate the centralised Student Loan Company (SLC) in England NOT Scotland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Student Loans are to be centralised to Glasgow.  At the same time Gordon and his cronies are facing a situation where the Scots do not pay any student fees in Scotland and yet English students will have to pay to attend a UK-subsidised scottish University!  Surely it has to be the height of insensitivity to plase the student loand company in Scotland!!
